translations: n．恶心的行为，尸鬼般的行为：类似尸鬼的行为，对死亡、痛苦或恐怖的事物表现出病态的兴趣。
· The ghoulishness of the scene was too much for some viewers.
这场景的恶心程度让一些观众无法承受。

sentences.sentence: In another exhibit five years ago, the suit was shown on a mannequin, prompting complaints of ghoulishness, which Boneberg said he tried not to repeat.
sentences.translation: 五年前的另一个展览，衣服被套在一个假装恶毒抱怨的模特身上，布隆伯格说他不会尝试重复。
